 1998-21481998-12-030,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
PrecisEnactment of an EXCLUSION APPROVAL ORDER FOR CERTAIN PERSONS AND POSITIONS IN THE CANADIAN INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT AGENCY - which exempts the appointments of FRED BLOCH and FRANK BOAHENE to level 4 positions in the Programme Administration Group (PM-04) at the Canadian International Development Agency from the application of specific provisions of the Public Service Employment Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SI / 1998-0123 Publication Date: 1998-12-23
